description: globally unique id for this event
name: id

description: BSON id of the user that this in app message was sent to
name: user_id

description: external user id of the user
name: external_user_id

description: API ID of the app on which this click occurred
name: app_id

description: unix timestamp at which the user clicked the in app message
name: time

description: API ID of the campaign this in app message belongs to
name: campaign_id

description: API ID of the message variation this user received
name: message_variation_id

description: API ID of the canvas this in app message belongs to
name: canvas_id

description: API ID of the canvas variation this user received
name: canvas_variation_id

description: API ID of the canvas step this in app message belongs to
name: canvas_step_id

description: API ID of the card this in app message comes from
name: card_id

description: version of the operating system of the device
name: os_version

description: id of the button clicked, if this click represents a click on a button
name: button_id

description: message send ID this message belongs to
name: send_id

description: id of the device on which the event occurred
name: device_id
